A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: what a let down this movie was.  After TFA failed to do anything with Luke\, it was up to this movie to fix that mistake.  Well it failed miserably and robbed fans of what they have been wait for since the original trilogy.  Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson are ruining this franchise.  Such a disappointment for fans and a rare failure by Disney.  I really have no desire to see the last movie in the trilogy at this point.  Kathleen needs to go!
